name: Ramp Bike Jumping
description:
A wise man once said, ‘You can’t jump on a bike on Mars… It’s impossible!’
And the other one, less wise, replied, ‘Hold my apple juice!’

In other words: if you can’t imagine something, our game is right here at your service.
Perform the most unimaginable stunts on motorcycles, bicycles, even skis! There’s no backbone to be broken here! And we know a guy who knows a guy, whose sister-in-law bent some laws of physics for us. That’s right, you can get really crazy with our game. So buckle up, or not... It doesn’t matter. The only thing that matters is pure fun and madness!! YEE-HAW!
